content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=34-41, y=-85--87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (41.0,-86.0), (39.0,-85.0), (37.0,-85.0)
- Collection chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5) for coal movement
- Current status: Two drills working, one out of fuel. Chests contain total of 1192 coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Mining and smelting setup:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5) for material movement
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10--6, y=-59)
Large mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Collection chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Current status: Two drills working, one out of fuel

### Smelting Array at position(x=0-6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (-0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters for material movement
- Connected transport belt system for input/output

### Power Generation Complex at position(x=-3.5-4.5, y=20-27)
Complete power setup:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Current status: Boiler out of fuel, system not fully operational

# ERROR TIPS

### Extraction errors
- Cannot extract from empty or non-existent containers
- Verify container exists and has required items before attempting extraction

### Entity placement errors
- Ensure target location is clear before placing entities
- Check entity dimensions and required space

### Fluid system errors
- Connect all fluid components properly before operation
- Ensure boiler has fuel for steam production

### Transport belt errors
- Clear blocked belts to allow item flow
- Ensure proper connection between belt segments

### Chest capacity errors
- Monitor chest capacity to prevent overflow
- Empty full output chests to maintain production flow
